name: n8n-nodes-base.googleSheetsTool
semantic_context: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets

preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets.displayName: Manage tasks in Google Sheets using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Google Drive File URL
Not a valid Google Drive File ID

dataMode.name: dataMode

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Map Each Column Below
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

dataMode.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataMode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

autoMapNotice.displayName: In this mode, make sure the incoming data is named the same as the columns in your Sheet. (Use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change it if required.)
autoMapNotice.name: autoMapNotice

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
locale
options.description:
The locale of the spreadsheet in one of the following formats:
  • en (639-1)
  • fil (639-2 if no 639-1 format exists)
  • en_US (combination of ISO language an country)

options.name: On Change
options.description: Volatile functions are updated on every change

options.name: Minute
options.description: Volatile functions are updated on every change and every minute

options.name: Hour
options.description: Volatile functions are updated on every change and hourly

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

clear.name: clear
clear.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

range.name: range
range.description: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F"
range.ai_hint: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F"

toDelete.name: toDelete
toDelete.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

filtersUI.name: filtersUI

values.name: lookupColumn
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: lookupValue
values.hint: The column must have this value to be matched

filtersUI.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

combineFilters.name: combineFilters
combineFilters.description: How to combine the conditions defined in "Filters": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true

options.name: AND
options.description: Only rows that meet all the conditions are selected

options.name: OR
options.description: Rows that meet at least one condition are selected

combineFilters.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnToMatchOn.hint: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed.
columnToMatchOn.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn

sheetsUi.name: sheetsUi

values.name: title
values.description: Title of the property to create

values.name: hidden
values.description: Whether the Sheet should be hidden in the UI

sheetsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'sheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'sheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation IN ["append", "appendOrUpdate", "clear", "delete", "read", "remove", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'sheetName'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'append' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'dataMode'
IF operation == 'append' AND dataMode == 'autoMapInputData' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'autoMapNotice'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'autoMapNotice'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'append' AND dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'append' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 4}} THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'options'
IF /dataMode == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'handlingExtraData'
IF /columns.mappingMode == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'handlingExtraData'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' THEN SHOW parameter 'clear'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'clear'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'wholeSheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'keepFirstRow'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'keepFirstRow'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'specificRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'startIndex'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'startIndex'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'specificRows' THEN SHOW parameter 'rowsToDelete'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'rowsToDelete'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'specificColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'startIndex'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'specificColumns' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnsToDelete'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'columnsToDelete'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'clear' AND clear == 'specificRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'range'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'toDelete'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'toDelete'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'delete' AND toDelete == 'rows' THEN SHOW parameter 'startIndex'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'delete' AND toDelete == 'rows' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberToDelete'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'numberToDelete'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'delete' AND toDelete == 'columns' THEN SHOW parameter 'startIndex'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'delete' AND toDelete == 'columns' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberToDelete'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'read' THEN SHOW parameter 'filtersUI'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'filtersUI'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 4.3}} AND resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'read' THEN SHOW parameter 'combineFilters'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'combineFilters'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 4.3}} AND resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'read' THEN SHOW parameter 'combineFilters'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'read' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF rangeDefinition == 'detectAutomatically' THEN SHOW parameter 'readRowsUntil'
IF rangeDefinition == 'specifyRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'headerRow'
IF rangeDefinition == 'specifyRange' THEN SHOW parameter 'firstDataRow'
IF rangeDefinition == 'specifyRangeA1' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 4.5}} THEN SHOW parameter 'returnFirstMatch'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 4.5}} THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAllMatches'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF sheetName == '' THEN HIDE parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF column == 'newColumn' THEN SHOW parameter 'columnName'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 4.7}} THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'between': {'from': 4, 'to': 4.6}}} THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'dataMode'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'columnToMatchOn'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'valueToMatchOn'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND dataMode == 'defineBelow' AND @version == 3 THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 4.7}} THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'between': {'from': 4, 'to': 4.6}}} THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'sheet' AND operation == 'appendOrUpdate' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'spreadsheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'spreadsheet' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'spreadsheet' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'sheetsUi'
IF resource == 'spreadsheet' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'spreadsheet' AND operation == 'deleteSpreadsheet' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
